Donate and Join Us Next Year!

Please check back with us next year to see our sponsored recipient. If you would like to make donate to the Huntsman Cancer Insitute research please click on the donate button below.

Donate

Each year all race proceeds are donated to an individual or family in need of our help and support. Since the first race in 2012 we have donated $66,000 dollars. A sincere thanks all our sponsors, runners and volunteers who have generously come together to support the race.
